// HUD
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 gColor;
//   row_major float4x4 gTranslate;
//   row_major float4x4 gUVTranslate;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name         Reg   Size
//   ------------ ----- ----
//   gTranslate   c200     4
//   gUVTranslate c204     4
//   gColor       c208     1
//

    vs_3_0
def c222, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.3
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_texcoord v1
    dcl_color v2
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_color o2
dcl_2d s0
    mul r0, c201, v0.y
    mad r0, v0.x, c200, r0
    mad r0, v0.z, c202, r0
//    mad o0, v0.w, c203, r0
mad r30, v0.w, c203, r0
    mul r0, c205, v1.y
    mad r0, v1.x, c204, r0
    mad r0, v1.z, c206, r0
    mad o1, v1.w, c207, r0
    mul o2, c208, v2

texldl r31, c222.z, s0 // r31.x = separation
mad r30.x, r31.x, c222.w, r30.x // X = X + separation * c222.w
mov o0, r30


// approximately 9 instruction slots used
